mission: Marvel Comics return: ICE THAW PANEL! Rabin returns! 'PEACE AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!' Oslo Accords panel: HISTORIC HANDSHAKE with Arafat! Discomfort lines visible. Building peace panels: Constructing while wrenches fly! CLANG! BANG! 'TRAITOR!' chants spread like symbiote across panels! BLACK OOZE! Rally panel: November 4, 1995, peace song notes float. ASSASSINATION NOIR: Three shots! BANG! BANG! BANG! Shield falls. 'Et tu, Yigal?' Hospital panel: Fading... 'I am... Peace Man.' Nation SPLITS down middle! Empty suit ceremony panel. Caption: 'Legacy: It's Complicated.'

input.hook: Marvel's Ice Thaw: Peace Avengers Assemble... then, darkness.

output.optimized_script: Marvel Comics returns: Ice Thaw Panel! Rabin, back from Oslo, calls for peace.  A historic handshake, yet discomfort lines etched deep.  Peace panels show construction, wrenches flying; CLANG! BANG!  'TRAITOR!' chants echo. Black ooze stains the ground.  A rally panel displays peace song notes.  November 4, 1995.  Three shots ring out! BANG! BANG! BANG!  The shield falls.  'Et tu, Yigal?' Rabin, fading in the hospital, whispers, 'I am... Peace Man.' The nation fractured. An empty suit stands in ceremony. Legacy: It is complicated.

segments.text: Marvel Comics returns: Ice Thaw Panel!
Rabin, back from Oslo, calls for peace.
A historic handshake, yet discomfort lines etched deep.
Peace panels show construction, wrenches flying; CLANG! BANG!
A rally panel displays peace song notes.
Three shots ring out! BANG! BANG! BANG!
Rabin, fading in the hospital, whispers, 'I am... Peace Man.'
An empty suit stands in ceremony.

visual_style.reasoning: The narrative elements like 'Marvel Comics return,' 'discomfort lines visible,' 'wrenches fly! CLANG! BANG!,' 'BLACK OOZE!,' 'ASSASSINATION NOIR,' and 'Nation SPLITS' strongly suggest a visual language best suited for the 'comic' style. This style can effectively convey action, emotion, and dramatic shifts in tone. Instagram's preference for creative and animated styles also aligns well with comic book aesthetics. A vibrant color palette will enhance the impact and visual interest for a general audience on Instagram.
